title: Thinking about quiting because of queue times
body:
I play this game as a way of distressing and breaking from my work day. I'm in bronze so you would think queue times would be relatively short.

During the week I try to fit a game in after work but the queue times are extremely long so its touch and go. Its the weekend so I get a chance to play a bit more.  I've currently been playing for about 2 hours and only got one game in (a stomp. Might have lasted 30min)

Does anyone have any insight into these queue times? Its getting to the stage where I will need to find a game I can actually get to play.

replies.body:
Got this message after the last time someone forgot to ban

'A player did not lock in their pick or ban. Your group was returned to matchmaking.
You are now back in a chat room with just your premade.'

I am not in a group or a premade.
